TopicTitle: KSP is broken for me, HELP, QUICK!

Articles.Content:
i am unable to do anything other than change the name and exit, the part selection is screwed up, and, and,

i have KWR, modulemanager, active texture management, EVE, TST, tavario aerospace & pizza, and i think thats it.

Help?

;.;

i cant write my story like this.

OR EVEN PLAY

:confused:;.;

Darn, that looks bad. I never had a problem that was that bad, but try quitting KSP, shutting down your computer, and when you get on your game, stay at the KSP window the whole time, because sometimes I have this bad part glitch and that is what I do. Hope it helps!

Your story is pretty good as well.
Im having a similar problem, the only mods that I have that you have are ATM and module manager. Are you using x32 or x64?

I had this problem too.

Sadly, your craft is lost. This is a bug that seems new to 0.90. I'm not sure the specifics, but as far as I know there is no way to recover them.

R.I.P
